onset.Description: Onset of the event in seconds

duration.Description: The duration of the event in seconds

trial_type.Description: Indicating associated component of task and stimulus type presented

Levels.present_story: A story is presented to the participant
Levels.question_story: A question is presented to the participant
Levels.story_wait: ~500ms window of wait period between story presentation and question
Levels.story_opt1: The first option for a story question is presented. Participant can response.
Levels.story_opt2: The second option for a story question is presente. Participant can response.d
Levels.story_answer: The participant answers the story question
Levels.story_to_question: Time from presentation onset to beginning of question
Levels.present_storyquest: Time from presentation onset to end of question
Levels.story_answerfull: Start of first question to end of story answer period
Levels.full_story: Full story window, from start of presentation to end of story response period
Levels.change: Change block, indicating a change in the task type
Levels.present_math: A math problem is presented to the participant
Levels.question_math: A math question is presented to the participant
Levels.math_answer: A window for the participant to answer the math question
Levels.math_to_question: Start of first question to end of story answer period
Levels.math_answerfull: Full math answer window, from start of question to end of math response period
Levels.full_math: Full math window from presentation to end of math response period

block.Description: The block within which the trial occurs

response_time.Description: The time it takes for the participant to respond in milliseconds

accuracy.Description: The accuracy of the participant's response

word_opt.Description: The specific word option presented for story options 1 or 2

overall_acc.Description: The overall accuracy of the participant across all trials

filtered_rttime.Description: The response time filtered for outliers using HCPs recommended time

math_lvl.Description: The difficulty level of the math question
